text: A gubernatorial election was held on 7 April 2019 to elect the next Governor of Fukui. == Candidates == *Issei Nishikawa* back by CDP, individuals LDP, DPFP. *Tatsuji Sugimoto, back by national LDP and NIK *Yukie Kanemoto, back by the JCP and SDP. == Results == == References == Category:Gubernatorial elections in Japan Category:2019 elections in Japan Category:April 2019 events in Japan Category:Politics of Fukui Prefecture
title: 2019 Fukui gubernatorial election
